abilities.description: User's body becomes lightning, making them intangible and immune to physical attacks.
User can generate and discharge powerful electrical attacks to electrocute opponents.

keyMoments.title: Logia Invincibility Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Raki's bullets pass harmlessly through Enel's lightning body, showcasing the Logia-type Devil Fruit's intangibility against physical attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes the overwhelming advantage Logia users have against normal attacks.

keyMoments.title: Enel Defeats Raki
keyMoments.description: Enel uses his lightning powers to electrocute and defeat Raki.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the deadly offensive capabilities of the Goro Goro no Mi.

weaknesses.description: Rubber is a natural insulator and immune to electricity, making rubber-based Devil Fruit users like Luffy the natural counter.
